DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether two tooth-colored glass ionomer material effective load-bearing dental filling .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Performance Posterior Glass Ionomer Restorations Adolescents ( KETAC )
DOC.detailed_description: In post-market longitudinal prospective randomize control clinical trial , posterior class II restoration evaluate clinical performance . The study investigate efficacy two high-strength glass ionomer restorative material period 3 year .
DOC.criteria: Criteria : need 2 Class II posterior restoration good health sufficient oral hygiene vital tooth caries outer and/or middle third dentin teeth must least one proximal contact restore isthmus less half intercuspal distance one enamelsupported antagonistic contact . study restoration contact pregnant breast feed erosion/eating disorder bruxism/traumatic malocclusion pulpitis cusp replacement radiographic bone loss/increased tooth mobility
